content.question: Which of the following is true of the 1935 Social Security Act?

choices.label: It legislated a tax that transfers money from workers to pensioners.
It provided health insurance for anyone who needed it.
It created benefits for the needy by using taxes on corporate profits.
It made the United States the first industrialized country to provide a social welfare system.
It was ended during the first hundred days of the New Deal.

content.answer: It legislated a tax that transfers money from workers to pensioners.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
